item.title: Generating Art With GANs
item.description: Final Image resulted from GANs Deep neural networks are used mainly for supervised learning: classification or regression. Generative Adversarial Networks or GANs, however, use neural networks for a very different purpose: Generative modeling While there are many approaches used for generative modeling, a Generative Adversarial Network takes the following approach: GANs model There are two neural networks: a Generator and a Discriminator. The generator generates a “fake” sample given a random vector/matrix, and the discriminator attempts to detect whether a given sample is “real” (picked from the training data) or “fake” (generated by the generator).
